accounts-ui.accounts-business-trust-desc: Trust is a legal arrangement whereby a person or entity (a trustee) holds property or assets, for the benefit of one or more beneficiaries.

We've detected that you are visiting Binance's service from a restricted country. According to our Terms of Use, we are unable to provide services to users while they are in a restricted country (including restricted IP addresses).
Your account and funds are safe. You can only withdraw, but depositing and other product trading services are suspended. For further support, please contact Customer service.

accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-noviceGuide-step1Desc:
Unlock Mystery Boxes when your friend registers and completes each of the following tasks - 
 1. Deposit more than $50 in total
2. Trade more than $200 in total
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-treasureMap-message2: Please note: the maximum number of boxes you unlock from referrals is 20 ({{depositNum}}/10 deposit and {{tradeNum}}/10 trades)
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-AMB-decrip: Ambrosus Ecosystem is a global blockchain that enables supply chain traceability and proof of origin solutions. Robust and scalable by design, Ambrosus Ecosystem is optimized for implementation and interconnectivity with the Internet of Things (IoT) devices, smart sensors and ERP systems.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-TLM-decrip: TLM is a simulated economy where players compete & collaborate with NFTs and Trilium.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-treasureMap-message1: You have unlocked {{num}} Mystery Boxes. With more boxes unlocked, you have a greater chance of unlocking a grand prize!
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-SHIB-decri: SHIBA INU (SHIB) is an experiment in decentralized community building, providing another meme coin experience similar to Dogecoin (DOGE). SHIB is the native token of SHIBA INU and will be the first listed token to incentivize using ShibaSwap, a decentralized exchange.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-DOGE-decri: Dogecoin (DOGE) is an open-source, peer-to-peer cryptocurrency reported to be "favored by all Shiba Inus worldwide". As a fork of the source code of Litecoin (LTC), its first block was mined in December 2013. Since then, it has risen to popularity as one of the most famous meme coins.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-BUSD-decri: BUSD is a 1:1 USD-backed stablecoin approved by the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS). Paxos and Binance issue the fully-collateralized token together, making it redeemable for the underlying USD without any extra fee.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-ROSE-decri: Oasis is a leading privacy-enabled, layer-1 blockchain suitable for DeFi with several key backers, including a16z, Pantera, Polychain and more. Oasis offers a high throughput and relatively cheap gas fees compared to other blockchains. ROSE is the native token for Oasis, used to pay fees on dApps like YuzuSwap, the network's first DEX.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-ETH-decrip: Ethereum is a decentralized network created by Vitalik Buterin in 2013, often referred to as "the world computer". Its network consists of an open-source, globally decentralized computing infrastructure that executes programs called smart contracts. This network is fueled by its native cryptocurrency, Ether (ETH).
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-XRP-decrip: XRP is a digital asset built to "power innovative technology across the payments space". It's the native digital asset of the XRP Ledger - an open-source, permissionless and distributed ledger operated by a network of peer-to-peer servers.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-myReferral-remindMess: Remind your friends to complete their tasks and unlock more Mystery Boxes together!
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-inviterPage-phase2-hi: New user reward quota is full
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-inviterPage-top-notic: Each invitee can only be referred via one referral offer.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-inviterPage-paragraph:
Each referral must complete the following tasks:
1. Deposit more than $50
2. Trade more than $200
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-ADA-decrip: Cardano (ADA) is an open-source Proof-of-Stake (PoS) blockchain network with decentralized application capabilities. It's based on a wide array of design components, including a dApp development platform, multi-asset supported ledger and verifiable smart contracts.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-inviterPage-paragraph: You must choose between the two referral modes (Referral Offer or Standard Referral) when referring friends. Each friend can only be invited using one referral mode.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-noviceGuide-step1Titl: How to unlock a Mystery Box
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-noviceGuide-step3Titl: Remind your referrals to complete tasks to open more Mystery Boxes. View your referrals here.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-CTSI-decri: CTSI is the blockchain OS, bringing mainstream software developers to smart contracts.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-RAMP-decri: RAMP is a collateralized stablecoin lending protocol that helps users leverage the full value of their crypto assets. This happens through mechanisms that unlock stablecoin liquidity while also earning high yields. RAMP is live on Binance Smart Chain and Polygon, with new blockchain networks such as Ethereum, Solana and more to be supported in the future.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-SOL-descri: SOL offers compatibility for Ethereum smart contracts through its pluggable smart contract platform. In July 2018, TRON acquired BitTorrent, a peer-to-peer file sharing service with more than 170 million monthly users across its products.SOL offers compatibility for Ethereum smart contracts through its pluggable smart contract platform. In July 2018, TRON acquired BitTorrent, a peer-to-peer file sharing service with more than 170 million monthly users across its products.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-OM-decript: MANTRA DAO is a community-governed, multi-chain, DeFi ecosystem with staking services, a lending & borrowing platform and a bot-free launchpad. It also runs a weekly lottery game and Proof-of-Stake validator operator for 15+ blockchains. The ecosystem currently supports Ethereum, BSC and Polygon but plans to expand on Solana, HECO, Terra, Polkadot, MANTRA Chain and more.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-BNB-decrip: BNB powers the Binance ecosystem and is the native asset of Binance Smart Chain. Besides its on-chain functions, BNB has a variety of other use-cases. These include fee discounts on Binance exchanges, payments with third-party services, and participation rights on Binance Launchpad. At the core of BNB’s tokenomics is its burn mechanism leading to regular reductions in its supply.
accounts-ui.referral-lite-act2-rewardCard-BTC-decrip: Bitcoin (BTC) is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency that functions as a means of exchange independent of central authorities. Launched in 2009, BTC was the first virtual currency to solve the double-spending issue. The network did this by timestamping and hashing transactions in blocks before broadcasting them to all the Bitcoin network's nodes.

BioSecMiniprogram.account deletion agreement 1: In compliance with the Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data (General Data Protection Regulation or “GDPR”), we hereby inform you that we are obliged by law to retain certain sets of your personal data for a  minimum period of 5 years counting from the date of the you terminate your business relationship with Binance (Deletion of your account).
BioSecMiniprogram.account deletion agreement 2: The purpose for this processing is to ensure compliance with Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorism Financing laws. As such, the lawful basis for this processing of your personal data is Article 6(1)(c) of the GDPR (“processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which the controller is subject”).

BioSecMiniprogram.sms-change-successful-desc: Your phone number has been changed. Please use your new phone number the next time you log in.
BioSecMiniprogram.sms-remove-confirm-desc:
• Withdrawals and P2P transactions will be disabled for {LIMIT_TIME} hours after removing your phone number verification to ensure the safety of your assets.
  • Two security verification methods are required for withdrawals and other actions. Using only one verification method will put your account at greater risk.
  • After this phone number is unlinked, you will need to wait 24 hours before using it again.
BioSecMiniprogram.sms-change-confirm-desc:
• Withdrawals and P2P transactions will be disabled for {{LIMIT_TIME}} hours after changing your phone number verification to ensure the safety of your assets.
  • After this phone number is unlinked, you will need to wait 24 hours before using it again.
BioSecMiniprogram.sms-remove-confirm-title: Are You Sure You Want to Remove Your Phone Number?
BioSecMiniprogram.sms-change-confirm-title: Are You Sure You Want to Change Your Phone Number?
BioSecMiniprogram.email-change-successful-desc: Your email address has been changed. Please use your new email address the next time you log in.
BioSecMiniprogram.sms-index-tip: Phone number verification adds another layer of security to your withdrawals and Binance account.
BioSecMiniprogram.all-2fa-change-tip: Withdrawals, P2P selling, and payment services will be disabled for {{LIMIT_TIME}} hours after you make this change to protect your account.
BioSecMiniprogram.sms-remove-safy-tip: Please enable email verification before removing phone number verification.
BioSecMiniprogram.phone-invalid: Please enter a valid phone number.
BioSecMiniprogram.password-invalid: Password must be at least 8 characters with 1 upper case letter and 1 number.
BioSecMiniprogram.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
BioSecMiniprogram.sms-remove-successful-desc: We have successfully removed your phone number. Please log in again with your email.
BioSecMiniprogram.passkey-guide-title-1: Works on all of your devices
BioSecMiniprogram.passkey-guide-desc-0: Instead of a password, log in using your face or fingerprint.
BioSecMiniprogram.passkey-guide-desc-2: Get better protection from online attacks like phishing.
BioSecMiniprogram.passkey-guide-desc-1: Use your passkeys to log in from any synced device.
BioSecMiniprogram.security-2fa-item-ga-desc: Use Binance/Google Authenticator to protect your account and transactions.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-requirement-1: You have less than 5 USD in your account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-failed-desc-2: If you have checked these requirements and are still seeing this prompt, please contact Customer Support.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-failed-desc-1: Please check the requirements listed below.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-requirement-3: You have no loans on your account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-requirement-4: Your isolated and cross margin account has a positive balance.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-agreement-1: We hereby inform you that the personal data you have provided in connection with your use of Binance Services shall be kept, for as long as it is required in order to fulfill the relevant purposes described in our Privacy Notice, and as may be required by law such as for tax and accounting purposes, compliance with Anti-Money Laundering laws, or to resolve disputes and/or legal claims or as otherwise communicated to you.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-agreement-2: While retention requirements vary by jurisdiction, information can be found <lk>here</lk>.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-requirement-5: You have no sub accounts under your account.
BioSecMiniprogram.passkey-remove-confirm-title: Are You Sure You Want to Remove Your Passkey?
BioSecMiniprogram.passkey-remove-confirm-desc:
• Withdrawals and P2P transactions might be disabled for {{LIMIT_TIME}} hours after removing your passkey to ensure the safety of your assets, based on our assessment of your risk level.
  • Passkeys give good protection to your account and asset. We recommend that you keep using passkeys.
BioSecMiniprogram.force-fido-dialog-title: Are you sure you want to turn on this switch?
BioSecMiniprogram.force-fido-dialog-content:
• Passkey verification will be MANDATORY during login and withdrawal after you turning on this switch.
  • Please make sure you have available passkeys on all of your frequently used devices.
  • If you lose access to your passkeys, you might need to contact Customer Support to help you reset your passkeys.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-desc: This account cannot be deleted due to the following reasons.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-8: The account is verified under a restricted country/region.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-6: There are sub accounts under this account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-5: There is a pending C2C case.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-7: Earn account's balance is not zero.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-4: The account type cannot be deleted. For sub accounts, delete them in 'Sub Account -> Account Management'.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-3: There is a loan in your account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-2: There is a pending appeal or unresolved case.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-wallet-reminder: If you create another account after this deletion, your identity verification may be blocked for 30 days or longer.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-1: Total assets are greater than 5 USDT.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-9: There is an active Binance Web3 Wallet. Please retrieve the private keys of your Web3 Wallet first. Refer to the <lk>FAQ</lk> for the instructions.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-10: There are frozen assets in your spot account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-15: There are assets or liabilities in your isolated margin account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-14: There are assets or liabilities in your cross margin account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-12: There are frozen assets in your funding account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-13: There are open orders in your spot account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-16: There is a pending Convert order.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-17: There is a pending Algorithmic order.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-18: There is an ongoing auto-invest plan.
BioSecMiniprogram.forcePasskey-check-title: Are you sure you want to turn on this switch?
BioSecMiniprogram.forcePasskey-check-1: Passkey verification will be MANDATORY during login after you turn on this switch.
BioSecMiniprogram.forcePasskey-check-desc: Please read through the information below and ensure all three checkboxes are checked to proceed.
BioSecMiniprogram.forcePasskey-check-2: Please make sure you have available passkeys on all of your frequently used devices.
BioSecMiniprogram.forcePasskey-check-3: If you lose access to your passkeys, you might need to reset all of your passkey to be able to login.
BioSecMiniprogram.forcePasskey-eligibility-check-subtitle: To use this feature, you must meet these following prerequisites.

BioSecMiniprogram.forcePasskey-eligibility-requirement-2: You must have more than 100 USD worth of asset in your account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-wallet-reminder-2: Please be advised that your transaction records will no longer be accessible once your account is deleted. Kindly download your transaction records before proceeding with the account deletion. Refer to the <lk>FAQ</lk> on the download instructions.
BioSecMiniprogram.addPasskey-unsupported-warning: The domain you are using does not support adding passkeys.

BioSecMiniprogram.addPasskey-unsupported-download-app: Scan this code with <tlink>Binance app</tlink> to add passkeys
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-20: There is an active Spot copy trading order.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-19: There is an active Futures copy trading order.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-21: There is an active Trading Bot.

BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-26: There are frozen funds in your account.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-27: You had a P2P transaction within the past 48 hours.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-28: There is an unresolved P2P dispute.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-agreement-3: Before deleting your account, we urge you to download your <lk1>account statements</lk1> and <lk2>transaction history</lk2> as it might be needed for your tax declaration, accounting or other purposes.
BioSecMiniprogram.passkey-update-desc: New passkeys will be automatically synced with your Google account. Please confirm to update your passkey.

BioSecMiniprogram.security_emergency_contact_empty_descrip: At Binance, the safety of your assets is our top priority. The Emergency Contact feature is designed to enable us to send email and SMS messages to you and/or your emergency contacts when your account remains inactive for a certain period of time. Your emergency contacts will have the option to submit an inheritance claim.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_emergency_contact_name_tips: Please enter a name that your emergency contact would recognize. We will use this name to contact them.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_notify_contact_tooltip: We will send a one-time message to the emergency contact, informing them that they have been added as your emergency contact.
BioSecMiniprogram.invalid_contact_name: Please enter a valid contact name.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_contact_info_tip: Please provide at least a phone number or email for the emergency contact. It would be preferable if the emergency contact is <lk>also a Binance user</lk>.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_error_contact_info_required: Please provide at least an email or phone number.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_emergency_contact_response_than: Thank You for Your Kind Response
BioSecMiniprogram.security_emergency_contact_response_welc: Welcome back to the Binance community. We have ceased the emergency contact process. Please go on to enjoy your crypto ride!
BioSecMiniprogram.security_delete_emergency_contact_confir: Are you sure you want to delete your emergency contact?
BioSecMiniprogram.security_emergency_contact_description: Your emergency contact is saved in our system. We will reach out to you and your emergency contact when your account has been inactive for a period of time. <lk>Learn more</lk>
BioSecMiniprogram.security_initial_contact_duration_descri: We will first try to contact you for this period of time, then start reaching out to your emergency contacts.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_inactivity_period_description: After your account has been inactive for this period of time, we will start reaching out to you and your emergency contacts.
BioSecMiniprogram.confirm-emergency-contact-description: Please make sure the contact information is correct. We will contact your emergency contact using this information when conditions you set are met.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_subuser_eligible_tips: Sub-accounts are not eligible to use this feature. Only master accounts can access this feature.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_emergency_contact_desc: Add emergency contacts for when your account is inactive
BioSecMiniprogram.security_kyc_required_desc: You need to complete identity verification before you can use this feature.
BioSecMiniprogram.lockScreen-setting: Unable to add passkey. Please ensure that Fingerprint ID or a lock screen password is enabled in your phone settings. Note that Face ID may not be supported on your device.
BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-not-allowed-29: The account has an open position on an Event Contract.

We continuously monitor for suspicious activity and strengthen security measures as needed to ensure the highest level of protection for your assets.

BioSecMiniprogram.security_contact_email_required_content: To ensure this message will be delivered, please add an email address for this emergency contact before leaving a message.
BioSecMiniprogram.security_leave_message_disclaimer_conten: Please do not include any sensitive personal information in your message. Binance is not responsible for any information disclosed through this message.

BioSecMiniprogram.account-deletion-wallet-reminder-3: If you delete your account and create a new one with a different referral relationship than your current account, you will lose eligibility for any referral rebates.
